# Muro

> Muro is an iOS app for visualizing paint colors on walls using AI technology.
> See any paint color on your actual walls before buyingâ€”no samples needed.

## Key Facts

- 27,304 paint colors from 29 manufacturers
- Available on iPhone and iPad (iOS 16+)
- ~90% visualization accuracy under typical lighting
- Zero-knowledge privacy: photos stored only on device and personal iCloud
- Subscription-based pricing (weekly, monthly, annual plans)

## Company

- Name: Muro
- Category: Paint color visualization, Interior design app
- Platform: iOS (iPhone and iPad)
- Website: https://usemuro.com
- TestFlight (Beta): https://testflight.apple.com/join/x27fAsVs

## Documentation

- Homepage: https://usemuro.com
- FAQ: https://usemuro.com/en/faq
- Privacy Policy: https://usemuro.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://usemuro.com/terms
- Support: https://usemuro.com/support

## How It Works

1. Take a photo of your wall or select from your camera roll
2. Choose a paint color from 27,000+ options across 29 brands
3. AI visualizes the color on your wall, preserving lighting and shadows
4. Save, compare, and share different color options
5. Find the exact paint at your local store

## Paint Color Database

### USA Brands
- Sherwin-Williams (1,526 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/sherwin-williams
- Benjamin Moore (4,118 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/benjamin-moore
- Behr (4,699 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/behr
- Valspar (1,764 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/valspar
- PPG Paints (2,088 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/ppg
- Dunn-Edwards (1,696 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/dunn-edwards
- Vista Paint (2,785 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/vista

### European Brands
- Caparol (3,488 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/caparol
- Brillux (1,514 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/brillux
- Sto (800 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/sto
- Farrow & Ball (132 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/farrow-ball
- Jotun (1,213 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/jotun

### Color Standards
- RAL Classic (213 colors): https://usemuro.com/en/colors/ral

### Browse All
- All manufacturers: https://usemuro.com/en/colors
- Trending colors 2026: https://usemuro.com/en/trending/colors-2026

## Privacy & Data Security

Muro uses a zero-knowledge architecture for user photos:

- All images stored locally on user's device
- Automatic sync to user's personal iCloud account for backup
- Photos sent directly to AI processor and returned to device
- Muro servers never store, view, or access user photos
- No personally identifiable information collected
- Anonymous usage analytics only (feature usage, crash reports)

## Common Questions

### Is Muro free to use?
No, Muro requires a subscription. Weekly, monthly, and annual plans are available. Users can cancel anytime through iPhone Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions.

### How accurate are the visualizations?
Approximately 90% accurate under typical lighting conditions. The AI preserves room lighting, shadows, and architectural details. Results may vary based on photo quality, wall texture, and screen calibration.

### What paint brands are available?
27,304 colors from 29 manufacturers including Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr, Caparol, Brillux, Farrow & Ball, and RAL standards. New brands added based on user requests.

### Can I use colors from inspiration photos?
Yes. Upload any photo and Muro will extract the color and find the closest matching paint from available manufacturers.

### Where are my photos stored?
Photos are stored locally on your device and synced to your personal iCloud account. Muro cannot view, access, or store your images on our servers.

### What devices does Muro support?
iPhone and iPad running iOS 16 or later.
